meanings.definition: To consume an excessive amount of something.
meanings.sent1: She was overconsuming sweets and candies, which made her feel sick.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overconsume junk food when he is stressed out.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was overconsuming acorns like there was no tomorrow!
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with shopping was overconsuming her bank account.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire was overconsuming everything in its path, leaving destruction behind.

meanings.definition: Consuming more than is necessary or healthy.
meanings.sent1: The overconsuming behavior led to weight gain and health issues.
meanings.sent2: Their overconsuming habits resulted in a pantry full of expired food.
meanings.sent3: The overconsuming cat ate all the treats in one sitting!
meanings.sent4: The overconsuming demand for the product caused shortages in stores.
meanings.sent5: The overconsuming waves crashed relentlessly against the shore, eroding the beach.
